remarks: There is no subspace strictly between the zero subspace and the span of a vector (i.e. a 1-dimensional subspace is an atom).  ( ~ h1datomi analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lspsnat.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnat.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspsnat.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspsnat.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnat $p |- ( ( ( W e. LVec /\ U e. S /\ X e. V ) /\ U C_ ( N ` { X } ) ) -> ( U = ( N ` { X } ) \/ U = { .0. } ) ) $.
